bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition quotation error. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry ying yu 蘡薁 quoting Ben cao shi yi 本草拾遺 : 滴目中，去熱翳 赤障 , “Dripped into the eyes it will remove heat shade and red screen”, writes: 滴入目中，去熱翳，赤白障 , “Dripped into the eyes it will remove heat shade and red and white screen ”. Further, in Bai bing zhu zhi yao 百病主治藥 Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 quotes the same passage as 點熱翳，去白障 , “Dripped onto a heat shade it will remove a white screen ”.
